channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s $100,000 visa targets a $280 billion India success story

item.title: Trump’s plan to charge $100,000 for new H-1B visas is met with dismay by CEOs who want the world’s top talent

item.title: U.S. lawmakers call for more military dialogue with China as premier Li Qiang welcomes ‘icebreaking trip’
item.description: "I’m deeply concerned that our two militaries don’t communicate more," said Rep. Adam Smith, who led the Congressional delegation to China.
